title: Venus Transit in the 7th House for Taurus Ascendant
summary: Venus transiting the 7th house highlights partnerships, marriage, agreements, and public interactions for Taurus Ascendant. This phase supports harmony in committed relationships, smoother negotiations, and improved interpersonal balance. Attraction toward cooperation and mutual understanding increases, making it easier to resolve differences through diplomacy. Business partnerships benefit from fairness and shared values. However, overcompromise or dependency on approval can weaken personal stance. When equality is maintained, this transit strengthens trust, attraction, and balanced long-term alliances.
closing: Venus in the 7th house refines relationships and alliances. Balanced cooperation transforms attraction into durable partnership.
